name: hello-cf-node
description: A hello world app for NodeJS running on Cloud Foundry

scripts.dev:instance0: export INSTANCE_INDEX=0; export PORT=808$INSTANCE_INDEX; nodemon backend/server.js
scripts.dev:instance1: export INSTANCE_INDEX=1; export PORT=808$INSTANCE_INDEX; nodemon backend/server.js
scripts.dev:instance2: export INSTANCE_INDEX=2; export PORT=808$INSTANCE_INDEX; nodemon backend/server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:instance0" "npm run dev:instance1" "npm run dev:instance2"
